instruction: Summarize this article about AI and its implications for society.
input: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly transforming how we think, work, and live. It is becoming increasingly embedded in our lives and has the potential to revolutionize sectors from health and education to transport, energy, finance, and retail. AI also has implications for society, such as raising questions about privacy, safety, fairness, and inequality.
output: AI is playing an increasingly large role in many aspects of our everyday lives, from work and education to transport and retail. It has the potential to revolutionize many industries, but its integration also presents ethical and societal questions such as privacy, safety, fairness and inequality.
